pkgmetadata.longdescription: Growth Charts via Smooth Regression Quantiles with Automatic Smoothness Estimation and Additive Terms // Fits non-crossing regression quantiles as a function of linear covariates and multiple smooth terms, including varying coefficients, via B-splines with L1-norm difference penalties. The smoothing parameters are estimated as part of the model fitting, see Muggeo and others (2021) doi:10.1177/1471082X20929802. Monotonicity and concavity constraints on the fitted curves are allowed, see Muggeo and others (2013) doi:10.1007/s10651-012-0232-1 and also doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.12924.85122 for some code examples.
